Line 4: Start Point (0.1406, 0.1875), End Point (0.1406, 0.0469) 5. Line 5: Start Point (0.1406, 0.0469), End Point (0.0, 0.0469) 6. This concludes the construction of **part 1**, a rectangular prism with the following dimensions: - length: 0.75 - width: 0.1875 - height: 0.1875</description>
